title: Tiles in a dream mean cleaning tiles and breaking or removing them

preview.html: Tiles in their familiar meaning are flat, smooth and smooth stones with which the floor expands to give an aesthetic shape, so they are a symbol of luxury and well-being.But what does the appearance of tiles in a dream mean? ... This is what we will explain together through this article, where we will explain the meaning of the appearance of tiles in a dream according to some of its phenomena or elements in the dream, so follow us with interest. Tiles in a dream. As we mentioned, tiles are a symbol of luxury, so the appearance of tiles in a dream is a symbol of abundant livelihood and smoothness. Life and generosity of the dreamer in his home. Shiny or clean tiles in a dream are a symbol of the purity of the house and its purity from any malicious spirit. Perhaps the interpretation of a dream about tiles in a dream symbolizes security and psychological comfort for the viewer. Interpretation of a dream about tiles, if it is in the house, palace, or any intimate place, It symbolizes familiarity, warmth, and interdependence. It can also symbolize happy and joyful events in the dreamer’s life. Tiles in a dream can be a symbol of the pioneer’s open doors of livelihood or his areas of work. Interpretation of a dream about tiles for an unmarried woman: If they are beautiful and shiny, this is a sign of Her distinguished social status. The white tiles in the dream symbolize the whiteness, kindness, and purity of the heart. If they are dirty and unclean, this is a symbol of some worries and sorrows that are haunting the dreamer at the present time. The tiles in the bachelor’s dream are a symbol of new changes in his life, perhaps a marriage or a new job. See also: Interpretation of cleaning the house in a dream Mopping the floor in a dream Interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream The interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s effort to change his life and circumstances for the better. Perhaps the interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream is a symbol of improvement in the dreamer’s social or material circumstances. The interpretation of cleaning tiles in The dream indicates that the dreamer will qualify for a matter that has a lot of good, such as a business partnership, a marriage project, or a job application. Perhaps cleaning the tiles in the dream is a sign of his repentance, purifying his soul, and cleansing it of the impurities of sins and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the tiles for a single woman: Perhaps it is repentance for some of her mistakes and sins. It could be a sign of a young man attending her wedding and it is also a symbol of a happy new life. Interpretation of a dream about breaking house tiles. As for the interpretation of a dream about breaking house tiles, this symbolizes some problems or fears that the dreamer is going through at that time. Perhaps the interpretation of a dream about breaking tiles is The house is a symbol of distress or financial crisis that the dreamer is going through. It may symbolize that the dreamer is suffering from some health problems or illness at that time. Interpretation of a dream about breaking house tiles in a dream for a pregnant woman, as this symbolizes the approaching date of her birth and her suffering from some fatigue during childbirth. Interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream for a married woman symbolizes sufficient positive changes in her life to change her circumstances for the better. Changing tiles in a dream for a married woman is a symbol of realizing her hopes and aspirations. Interpretation of cleaning tiles in a dream for a married woman if she is sick.

title: Interpretation of seeing someone drowning in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing someone drowning in a dream or a dream and drowning is the death of a person in sea or river water because he cannot swim or he is swept away by the current of water and high waves. Seeing drowning in a dream indicates problems and fears, and drowning in clean water means a lot of bliss and prosperity, and we will explain in this article that it is the interpretation of seeing someone drowning in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married and a pregnant woman, as well as an unmarried man and young man, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, and the imams provide interpretations The greats in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad bin Shirin. And Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi and other translators in ancient and modern times, so follow us on the vision website. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a person drowning in a dream? Seeing drowning in clear water means that you are enjoying the bliss and prosperity of this world. Seeing salvation from drowning announces good news. The condition and repentance are sins. Seeing a sick person drowning indicates his death. Seeing a dead person drowning indicates his bad condition in the afterlife. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream means sin and calamity. Seeing an infidel drowning in his dream indicates his repentance and conversion to Islam. What is the interpretation of a dream about a brother drowning? Vision The brother drowning indicates that this and the like. He is exposed to problems or debts. Seeing a brother drowning with screams and screams means that the dreamer is going through a severe experience and anguish. Seeing a brother drowning can indicate family problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dear person drowning? A dream about a son drowning indicates that this son is facing a big problem and needs... To help. If a wife sees that her husband is drowning, this may indicate that he is indulging in lusts and sins. Seeing a friend drowning in a dream means that this friend is facing financial difficulties or a problem and needs support and support. What is the interpretation of a dream about a relative drowning? Seeing a close person indicates Drowning, like an uncle or aunt, indicates that this person will face a big problem and may need help. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream indicates bad luck and unwanted things that may happen to the dreamer. Dreaming of drowning in a lake indicates obstacles and trials that the dreamer faces and the difficulty of getting out Among them. Seeing someone close to you drowning indicates the accumulation of debts on the fortuneteller or that person. What is the interpretation of a dream about saving someone from drowning for a single woman? Dreaming about a girl drowning indicates her preoccupation with worldly desires, and staying away from religion and the shortcomings of worship. Seeing a girl drowning means that she will enter into a relationship A love affair ends in failure. Seeing a patient saved from drowning indicates his recovery from the disease. Seeing a prisoner surviving from drowning indicates his escape from prison. Seeing a girl drowning means that what she was hoping for will not come true. Seeing a person being saved from drowning indicates that difficulties and adversities have been overcome. What is the interpretation of a dream about a child drowning? Seeing a child drowning in a dream indicates fears and problems in the life of the dreamer, and the vision may indicate pain for that child. Seeing a child drowning in a man’s dream means material losses. We are happy to see the reception of your dream about “Interpretation of a dream about a drowning person” through the comments The dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: How does the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, see himself in a dream?

preview.html: Because as our Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, told us, at the end of time there will come people who want to see me, and he is more precious to them than their money and their children. Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees the Messenger happy in a dream, this indicates her marriage to a good man who has religion. And morals and that he will honor her in his house. But if an unmarried woman sees that the Messenger is warning her about something or as if he is angry with her, this indicates that he is far from God, and should approach him with prayer and other acts of worship. But if she sees that the Messenger died in a dream, this indicates an imminent death. Likewise, if she sees a funeral and indicates that it is the funeral of the Messenger, then she will lose something dear to her. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is feeding the Messenger food, this indicates that she is giving alms or zakat, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees that the Messenger prayed In a dream, God blesses her as if he is happy with her. This indicates a good marriage. See also: Interpretation of seeing colors in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that the Messenger is giving leave to her home, this means that her home will live well. And if Her husband has paid debts, and if her husband is a merchant, she will make a profit, and if they have problems, they will be solved, God willing. And if the Messenger saw in a place that place was ruined or deserted, then this is good news, because it indicates that that place will be built again. And if she saw A married woman sees that the Messenger is standing in her husband’s place of work or place of work, then this indicates an increase in her husband’s profit and an increase in his money. But if a married woman sees that she is offering food to the Messenger and feeding him. This indicates that she is giving alms or zakat from her husband’s money, or feeding the needy and the poor. If a married woman sees the Messenger in a dream smiling at her, then this is a happy woman visiting the Sacred House of God and performing the Hajj. But if she sees the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and looks at him while he is angry, then this indicates the seriousness of her negligence in her religion, or it is possible that she will make her husband very angry. And he commits sins. If a married woman sees the Messenger standing in the desert, this indicates that this desert will be filled with goodness. Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream about the man and its meaning. But if he sees the Messenger standing in his house in a dream, this indicates the building of his house and increasing the livelihood in it. And that he has a good wife to help him. In his life. If a man sees that the Messenger is looking at him with pleasure, this indicates Hajj and a visit to the Sacred House of God. But if he sees the Messenger sitting in a place where he trades, this indicates the profit of his trade and an increase. If one sees the blood of the Messenger in a dream and killing the Messenger, this indicates On his martyrdom. And if he saw that a place had perished long ago, and the Messenger stood next to him and called the call to prayer, then this indicates that that place was built and returned to what it was. And if he saw that the Messenger gave him something as a gift, then this indicates good offspring in this world and success in his deeds. And whoever sees That the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, looked at him with anger. This indicates his shortcomings in matters of his religion and urges him to get closer to

And if he saw that the Messenger gave him something as a gift, then this indicates good offspring in this world and success in his deeds. And whoever sees That the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, looked at him with anger. This indicates his shortcomings in matters of his religion and urges him to get closer to

title: Interpretation of seeing eating sugar in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing eating sugar in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. It is known that dreams are a special world in which ambiguity and secrets prevail and interpretations abound, and as is the case with any vision, the interpretation of seeing sugar in a dream varies depending on the dreamer of this vision. A single, married or pregnant girl. In addition to its different interpretation also depending on whether the fortuneteller sees himself preparing sugar, eating it, buying it, or offering it to someone, we present below the interpretation of the great interpreters of visions and dreams, including Ibn Sirin, and we deal with the interpretation of seeing sugar in A dream in any form and in each case in detail is as follows: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing sugar. The great translator Ibn Sirin believes that seeing sugar in a dream has good and bad connotations. It also indicates an abundance of food, and whoever sees that he is eating sugar will gain pride, pride, and blessings, and whoever sees that he was If he sells sugar in his dream, this is evidence that he will be exposed to an embarrassing situation. . Rather, he escapes from it, and God knows best, or exposes himself to try to deceive those who oppose him and expose her. Interpretation of seeing sugar for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees sugar in her dream, this indicates many associations. If he sees that he is eating it, this is a sign that he is hearing the good news. It is also an indication of the happiness that will sweep his life in the coming period. Also, sugar in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that her desire will be fulfilled in the near future, God willing. But if she sees that she is buying sugar in In a dream, this is good news about a good event or good news about her engagement and marriage or getting a long life. But if she sees someone giving her sugar in her dream, then she will have a great benefit such as work or travel. You should not drink a lot of sugar in a dream, because it warns of following desires and greed, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision of sugar for a married woman In a house where there is stability in the house and indoors, it's all the problems and recordings in the house, it's iron and fine, it's out of the way, and it's there in the house If a pregnant woman sees sugar in her dream, then her dreams are auspicious and auspicious, and an indication of an easy and easy birth, and good news that she will achieve what she wants, which is the birth of males or females. . . Sugar in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate an improvement in her condition and an improvement in her health, and if she is sick, she will recover from her fatigue and pain, God willing.

title: Interpretation of a dream about frying fish

preview.html: Fish is a light and favorite food for many people, and through our next article we will find the interpretation of a dream about frying fish in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about frying fish in a dream. Ibn Sirin showed in a dream that fried fish in a dream indicates the satisfaction of desires and the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires. Also, frying fish in a dream indicates On the repayment of debts and the coming of relief and kindness. Fried fish also indicates the arrival of the traveler, absent fish, and fried fish in a dream indicates distance. Large fried fish in a dream indicates a lot of money, but on the condition that the fish is delicious and tender. Small-sized fried fish in a dream shows The fears and problems that the dreamer will face in his life. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing small fried fish in a dream indicates sadness for children or women. Fish in a dream, if it is numbered, indicates women, just like many fish in a dream, if not Numbered, they indicate kindness and nourishment. A live fish in a dream indicates a virgin, and eating it in a dream indicates status and power. Grilled fish in a dream indicates profits and the fulfillment of dreams and goals. Grilled fish in a dream indicates travel. Read also: Interpretation of a dream Eating fried fishInterpretation of frying fish in a dreamIbn Sirin showed that frying fish in a dream indicates good money. Also, frying fish in flour in a dream means that you are spending money on things that bring you profit. Also, frying fish in flour indicates that you are spending money on work that is not Profitable and not useful. Ibn Shaheen pointed out that frying fish in a dream means traveling with a prominent person. Also, frying fish in oil in a dream indicates benefit to the dreamer after a tiring partnership. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is frying fish in oil, but the oil boils from the pan or If it burns, this indicates problems and disturbances that the dreamer will be exposed to. Also, a frying pan in a dream indicates a sad lady whose tears do not dry at all. Frying a small fish in a dream indicates the hostility that exists between the dreamer and his family. Also, frying a small fish in a dream indicates Clinging to a hopeless hope, it also indicates a desire that the dreamer makes but does not achieve. A small fish in a dream is a shameful thing in general. Frying fish with its skin in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to difficult things and many difficulties. Frying fish with its skin also indicates that you will fall In a trick or a piece of land. Frying fish on scales in a dream means stopping paying zakat. As for a soft fish in a dream without skin, it indicates disappointment and the pursuit of things that are completely useless, and it also indicates false actions. Some dream interpreters have reported Also, frying fish in a dream indicates excessive stress and fatigue in earning a living. Everything in the dream that contains oil indicates anxiety, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish in a dream: Eating fried fish in a dream means nutrition and profit, but on the condition that it is ripe. It indicates Removing bones from fried fish in a dream to dissolve gm

title: Interpretation of makeup in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of makeup in a dream - this is what we will present in this article, as makeup is considered one of the most important tools that women use for adornment and beautification, and there are certain visions related to makeup that worry many women, so why not. They have all been interpreted forever, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will learn about the opinions of interpretation scholars on visions of makeup. Interpretation of makeup in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of makeup in a dream Ibn Sirin says that if someone sees that he is putting makeup on his face, his vision shows that he is always trying to beautify his appearance. And his image in front of others and that he is dissatisfied with himself and if - is much higher, this means that the fortuneteller is trying to deceive people and hide his true face from them. Seeing a man buying makeup for his wife indicates the intensity of his love for her and that he wants to see her in her best image.. a big secret for her. If one sees that he is wearing makeup, this indicates that his condition will change in the coming period if he is single. Problems. Interpretation of makeup in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. From Ibn Shaheen’s point of view, wearing makeup in a dream is evidence that he is trying to hide something and many faults in front of others. If a married man sees that he is wearing makeup at home, his dream indicates that he is seriously ill or suffering from a lot of illness. Disagreements with his wife that may lead to divorce, and for a man or woman, this indicates good changes in life. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of makeup in a dream. Al-Nabulsi says that wearing makeup in a dream means that he will suffer from many psychological crises, and it may indicate that he will emerge from his hidden reality as quickly as possible. It can and may indicate that he has good morals and a good reputation. Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman using makeup in a dream indicates her eloquence in speaking with others, her marriage to a wealthy man, or her obtaining a lot of money. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she If she wears a large amount of makeup, her dreams indicate that she is not interested in those around her, and her dreams while wearing makeup may indicate that she holds a grudge against her friends, out of envy. And he becomes jealous of them. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman wearing makeup. If a married woman sees that she is wearing makeup, this indicates that she wants to hide her true age in reality or her constant desire to appear good with her husband, his relatives, and his family. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing makeup means that she feels She is worried and stressed about giving birth, and if she is wearing makeup and is happy, this indicates that she will have an easy birth and enjoy health and wellness. To interpret another dream in an encyclopedia, you can use the interpretation of dreams application.

title: Interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream and dreaming of eating nuts

preview.html: Seeing nuts in a dream symbolizes money and livelihood that we are tired, and whoever sees that he is eating nuts in a dream, this indicates contentment, happiness, and recovery from illness, and seeing citrus fruits in a dream indicates fatigue in livelihood or happiness. This does not last, and dreaming of sweets with nuts indicates the sweetness of life. Interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing nuts in a dream means money that only comes with effort and effort, and whoever sees a lot of nuts in a dream, this indicates an abundance of nutrition. Seeing the shell of nuts in a dream indicates On the seriousness of the many circumstances and problems that the dreamer faces, and if you see yourself peeling nuts or breaking them in a dream, this indicates overcoming life’s difficulties and circumstances. Dreaming of giving nuts to someone indicates generosity and generosity. Whoever sees that he is distributing nuts to others in a dream, he will pay zakat on his money. It helps the poor. Roasted nuts in a dream are evidence of contentment and prosperity in life, and whoever sees dry nuts in a dream, this indicates distress and distress, and if you see rotten nuts in a dream, this indicates corruption in profit and sustenance. Interpretation of nuts in Nabulsi’s dream. Al-Nabulsi says: “Nuts in A dream indicates abundant livelihood.” It was said that whoever sees walnuts in a dream will have prosperity and be cured of diseases. Seeing collecting nuts in a dream means preserving and collecting things. Seeing a variety of nuts in a dream indicates a variety of sources of livelihood. Cracking nuts in a dream indicates overcoming difficulties and overcoming obstacles that the dreamer faces. Offering nuts to guests in a dream indicates generosity and generosity, and whoever sees nuts in the markets in a dream This indicates happiness and pleasure. Interpretation of a dream about eating nuts: Seeing yourself eating nuts in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance after being exhausted. As for seeing yourself eating nuts in a dream, this means acquiring a lawful animal. Eating nuts with food in a dream indicates wealth and riches, and drinking milk With nuts in a dream indicates an easy and clean livelihood, and dreaming of drinking almond milk indicates that you are obtaining benefits from wealthy people. Choking on nuts when eating them in a dream means stinginess and deficiency, and if you see that you are eating nuts with bread in a dream, this means that you will gain a little livelihood. Seeing someone you know eating nuts in a dream indicates the enormity of his circumstances and conditions, and if you see one of your relatives eating with you in the dream, this means that you receive an inheritance. Interpretation of seeing food in a dream. Symbol of interpretation of citrus fruits in a dream. Seeing citrus fruits in a dream means following a difficult diet. And whoever dreams that He eats citrus fruits, this indicates that he has desires for pleasure that do not last. Whoever dreams of eating sweets at home, this indicates that he is overcoming distress and anxiety, and a dream of eating nuts in the streets indicates joy and happiness. Buying pleasure in a dream means that you will get a difficult job and that eating fruits Citrus fruits from someone in a dream means that you are calculating

title: Interpretation of a dream about baklava and the consequences of eating baklava in a dream

preview.html: Discover with us the interpretation of a dream about baklava in a dream and the meaning of baklava in a dream through a website on dreams. Watch the opinions of dream interpreters of seeing baklava in a dream and the consequences of eating baklava in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about baklavaBaklava is one of the simple oriental sweets and seeing it in a dream carries many connotations and meanings. We will show you As much as possible all the clues and interpretations about seeing baklava in a dream. Seeing baklava in a dream means that circumstances, joy or happiness are coming. Interpretation of baklava in a dream can be a sign of good news. Seeing baklava in a dream for the sick person is healing and the prisoner is comfort and freedom. Baklava also indicates The arrival of sustenance, kindness, or money, and perhaps a sign of success. Based on the fact that he gives baklava to someone, he can herald happy news or a wish that he had hoped for. Distributing baklava in a dream shows that the fortuneteller is a sociable person and likes to sit with people. And preparing or preparing baklava. It is the best way to live and improve living conditions. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets. Seeing kunafa in a dream. Eating baklava in a dream. Eating baklava in a dream is evidence of kindness, and eating all sweets in a dream is beneficial for the pioneer. As for eating a lot of baklava or any type of sweets, it is not Well. The interpretation of eating baklava in a dream indicates profits and gains. If a married woman sees that her husband buys a lot of baklava, this indicates a lot of income and livelihood. Baklava in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of a dream about baklava for a single woman is one of the beautiful dreams that brings a lot of goodness. Interpretation of a dream about eating baklava for single women may indicate marriage, engagement, or happy circumstances in the near future. To dream of buying baklava for unmarried women means sustenance and benefit for them. Interpretation of seeing baklava in a dream for a single woman can be a sign of success and superiority. To interpret your dream, you can comment below the article and we will respond and explain as quickly as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing daffodils in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing narcissus in a dream or dream through the vision site roy2a.com Seeing narcissus in a dream means money and prosperity, as it indicates longevity, and seeing a narcissus wreath means the marriage of an unmarried young man to a beautiful girl that does not last long, as well as in a girl's dream. Interpretations of narcissus indicate joy and happiness, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream for Ibn Sirin in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, as well as for a man and a pregnant woman. An unmarried young man, a divorced woman, and a widow, and provides interpretations of the great imams in the interpretation of dreams and visions such as Imam Muhammad bin Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and other interpreters in the past. And the modern era, follow us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing narcissus in a dream for Ibn Sirin: Seeing a narcissus flower in a dream for a single young man announces his marriage to a beautiful and beautiful girl. Seeing a growing narcissus in a dream for a married woman indicates that she gave birth to a boy. Seeing a narcissus in a dream indicates wealth and riches. Seeing a narcissus flower in a dream indicates longevity. See the white narcissus indicates money in dirhams and the yellow narcissus indicates the dinar. See also: Interpretation of a dream about losing money What is the interpretation of seeing a narcissus in a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees a narcissus in her dream, it indicates that her marriage is approaching, but it may not continue, or indicates the dissolution of the engagement. Seeing a white narcissus in a dream for a girl indicates a prestigious job from which she gets a lot of money. Seeing a narcissus on a plate or bowl for a single girl indicates that the engagement is suspended and the marriage is suspended. Narcissus in a dream for a girl shows that she heard the news that makes her happy. What is the interpretation of seeing a married narcissus in a dream: If a married woman sees a bouquet of flowers Narcissus in a dream, indicates the occurrence of evil and evil for her and divorce or separation between spouses by death. If a married woman sees a white narcissus, it indicates an abundance of goodness and gaining a lot of money, as well as a yellow narcissus indicates the acquisition of money. Seeing narcissus for a married woman indicates pleasure and joy that does not last. If a married woman sees that her husband gave her a narcissus flower, it indicates the presence of problems and disputes between them that may lead to divorce. Seeing narcissus in a dream for a married woman indicates longevity until old age and the longevity of narcissus for the curvature of the back. See also: Interpretation of seeing a garden in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing narcissus in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a bouquet of narcissus flowers in a dream, it indicates a stumbling work. If a pregnant woman sees narcissus on a plate, it indicates that he received an amount of money. What is the interpretation of seeing narcissus in a divorced woman’s dream? If a divorced woman sees a white narcissus, it shows that he heard good news. Seeing a crown of narcissus in a divorced woman’s dream indicates a relationship that does not last or a marriage that does not last. What is the interpretation of White narcissus in a dream: White narcissus indicates that you have a lot of money and that you are rich. Seeing a narcissus indicates longevity and improved health. See also: Interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream What is it?

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lighter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lighter in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about loveInterpretation of a lighter in a dreamDream of a lighterInterpretation of a dream about cigarettes by Ibn SirinInterpretation of fire in a dreamFire ​​in a dream for a single womanInterpretation of seeing butane gas by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin’s dream of the ulna: Search for a matter until it becomes clear to him. Whoever sees that he has lit a fire to warm it with the help of a cruel man who has authority and a man Strong with intensity. Poverty and its benefit, if they meet, they establish the command of the Sultan and point to them because the stone is a solid man and the iron is a man with strength and fire is strength, and if a woman sees that she has kindled fire, then it burns and burns with its scent, she will give birth to a boy, and the fire will hang, because the woman became pregnant and the child comes out between the husband and wife, It can indicate evil between or between them. Two rivals or partners, and the evil between them is reprehensible words, religion. Interpretation of a dream by Al-Zend by Al-Nabulsi: A cup in a dream is a search for something until he gains it and is suitable for him. The fire is for two fierce men fighting fiercely, and it was said: If the trigger is the marriage of a single man, and if the fire is lit, the wife becomes pregnant, then this is an insult to the religion. Ibn Shaheen dreamed of the trigger: And whoever sees a burning fire to burn it, then he will seek help from a cruel principle in extreme poverty, and two stones fighting two immoral men and extinguishing them. Their soothing agitation. As for extinguishing a bright fire in a country, it is the death of its leader, and in a home, it is the death of its value.
